info.name: Calendar
info.description:
The Calendar app is a user interface for ownCloud's CalDAV server. Easily sync events from various devices with your ownCloud and edit them online.
* **Integration with other ownCloud apps!** Currently Contacts - more to come. * **WebCal Support!** Want to see your favorite team’s matchdays in your calendar? No problem! * **Attendees!** Invite people to your events.
info.author: Georg Ehrke, Raghu Nayyar, Bernhard Fröhler, Julian Müller
